post.author: 김중수

comment.author: 김중수
comment.content:
원하시는 분은 이력서를 제게 보내주시거나 제 이름을 reference에 넣고 아래로 이메일로 직접 보내세요.. Michel Carreau <mcarreau@synexusglobal.com>
그리고 만약에 일을 하게 되시면 소개비 있는것 아시죠? (담배 1개피 + 팀호튼 커피 1잔)..좀 비싸죠?

post.content:
Hi, Eddy We have a requirement for a temporary job for one and possibly two junior developers conversant in C#. Failing that, we will consider junior developers conversant in Java who can learn C#.
The work will be in Toronto during November and December full time.
Please let me know if you know of anyone who could fit that requirement.
Best regards,
Michel Carreau <mcarreau@synexusglobal.com>
Michel Carreau
Director of Operations
post.title: Urgent Junior Java programmer..(It's good chance to learn C#)
